# {{ja-def|鳴門巻き}} A type of {{m|ja|蒲鉾|tr=kamaboko||fishcake}} that is white on the outside with a pink spiral pattern on the inside. Prepared in [[loaf|loaves]] or [[roll]]s, then sliced and added to dishes as a [[garnish]].
